About Bill Hwangs Restrnt Bill Hwangs Restrnt is a Fast Food restaurant located at 879 Canton Rd in Akron, OH . Bill Hwangs Restrnt has been described as an Perfect Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 10 by our members. Quick Facts

Gordito Burrito is an excellent place for fresh quick mexican food. Located on the Miracle Mile in a quaint old neighborhood. The service is friendly and the food is delicious. Try the breakfast burritos! They're delicious!
